bropals.lib.simplegame.entity.component

Class BaseComponentEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • bropals.lib.simplegame.entity.BaseEntity
      • bropals.lib.simplegame.entity.component.BaseComponentEntity

  • public abstract class BaseComponentEntity
extends BaseEntity
    An entity that uses components to define its behavior. Rendering is done by extending and overriding render() like BaseEntity.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BaseComponentEntity(GameWorld par)
      Creates a new component entity with the given parent.

      Removes a component from this entity, shrinking its behavior.

      Updates this entity.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseComponentEntity

        public BaseComponentEntity(GameWorld par)
        Creates a new component entity with the given parent. The parent will add this entity to its list of entities.
        Parameters:
        par - this component entity's parent.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Description copied from class: BaseEntity
        Updates this entity. Meant to be overridden and implemented in a subclass.
        Specified by:
        update in class BaseEntity

      • addComponent

        public void addComponent(EntityComponent component)
        Adds a component to this entity, extending its behavior.
        Parameters:
        component - the component to add

      • removeComponent

        public void removeComponent(EntityComponent component)
        Removes a component from this entity, shrinking its behavior.
        Parameters:
        component - the component to remove

      • getComponent

        public <T extends EntityComponent> T getComponent(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Gets the component of the specified type in this entity.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of the component that is being obtained
        Parameters:
        type - the class of the component that is being obtained
        Returns:
        the component of that type, or null if this entity does not have a component of that type.
